acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should return a null value for non instantiable POJOs
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldReturnANullValueForNonInstantiablePojos

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.NonInstantiatableClass
Then the object should be null
